name: Hunger Dungeon
description: Hunger Dungeon is a 1-6 player round-based Multiplayer Online Battle Arena game with a special pixel art style. Battle with more than 12 unique characters in fast-paced Free-for-All and Team Deathmatch rounds. Or take on the challenging Dragon Mode - the exciting first PvE mode!
minimum_requirements: OS: windowsXP Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.1 Capable Video with 512MB VRAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: Fantastic game!  Though, it does have a small community and it feels like it's missing a lot of content. I personally thought before I went into this game was that it would be a Diablo esque type of game. I wish it had some kind of 'Adventure Mode.' Like it would have a Singleplayer story or something and have a Multiplayer feature to it as well. I do dislike the fealing of lack of content but overall it's a great game!   It's a fun to get together with friends and destroy your friendships together in the Massacre (Free For All) mode! This game would also be even better if the game was being updated and supported by the developers.!  Final Rating: 8/10
Not what i was expecting!  Wish it had a single player typa campaign that was not just battle mode.   Is alright for free i suppose and worth a try though!
is a very good game,is a moba game ,and is free, i would pay 10$ to Buy this game (is free is very good)but it cannot full screen( is fine)
